short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Monitor and set alerts for cryptocurrency prices.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Crypto Monitor - Your Personalized Cryptocurrency Tracker

Stay ahead of the crypto game with Crypto Monitor, the ultimate tool for tracking the top 25 cryptocurrencies in real-time! Set personalized buy and sell thresholds, receive instant notifications when market prices meet your targets, and never miss a trading opportunity again. Whether you’re a seasoned trader or just starting out, Crypto Monitor simplifies your crypto management with:

Real-Time Price Tracking: Monitor Bitcoin, Ethereum, and 23 other leading cryptocurrencies in real-time.
Custom Alerts: Set your preferred buy/sell thresholds and get notified immediately when the market hits your target.
Seamless User Experience: A sleek and user-friendly interface designed to make your crypto tracking smooth and intuitive.
Works Even When You’re Not Watching: Crypto Monitor keeps working in the background, so you can focus on what matters most.
Take control of your crypto strategy today with Crypto Monitor—your trusted companion in the world of digital currency.
